data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The name: POE::Component::Client::SMTP; the module is POE dependent
    (a session), is a POE component, serves as a Client (not Server) and
    uses the SMTP protocol.

    There isn't another module that acts as a POE aware client for the
    SMTP protocol (as far as I know).

    As far as discussed on the POE mailing list (poe@perl.org) no one
    object on registering this namespace.
